name: Corndog Simulator
description:
Just so you know, I absolutely suck at this, this is LITERALLY my first game, and it was an inside joke between my friend, it's just a pathetic clicker game.  Currently, the max boost per click is 10, because the way I do it is jank, but hopefully ill release a build where it goes higher soon. Just fyi, there is no point this is just for the memes. 

P.S: There is no way to get to the title screen from the game, so if you want to close you'll have to do Alt + F4
